VIII.iv.8.A.3.a
.
Future Examination Control of Prestabilization Ratings
When assigning a prestabilization rating, set a future examination control between 6 and 12 months following separation from service for all SC disabilities that are evaluated under
38 CFR 4.28
.
Reference
:Â  For more information on future examinations, see
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, 1.B
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section A - Prestabilization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.28
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section A
